Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood, South Chicago and over regular route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near 26th/Lawndale
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses temp. rerouted Southbound: Central Park, 31st and Lawndale; Northbound: Central Park and 25th: due to street blockage near 26th/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 26th/Lawndale, due to street blockage near 26th/Lawndale.

Southbound buses will operate via Central Park, 31st, Lawndale and over regular route.

Northbound buses will operate via Central Park, 25th and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems near Roosevelt.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems near Roosevelt. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at UIC-Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at UIC-Halsted.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.
